mapper.sql: CSY120, CSY110, CSY020, CSY121, CSY122, CSY124, CSY125, CSY126, CSY127
mapper.select: select count(sy12.csy120) as value, sy01.csy011 as name, sy01.csy010 as id from sy01 sy01, sy02 sy02, sy12 sy12 where sy12.csy020 = sy02.csy020 and sy02.csy010 = sy01.csy010 and sy12.csy127 = 0 and sy02.csy023 = 0 and sy01.csy012 = 0 group by sy02.csy010

select sy10.csy101 as csy101, sy11.csy111 as csy111, sy11.csy112 as csy112, sy02.csy021 as csy021, sy12.csy120 as csy120, sy12.csy121 as csy121, sy12.csy122 as csy122, sy12.csy123 as csy123 from sy10 sy10, sy11 sy11, sy02 sy02, sy12 sy12 where sy12.csy127 = 0 and sy10.csy102 = 0 and sy11.csy116 = 0 and sy02.csy023 = 0 and sy12.csy110 = sy11.csy110 and sy11.csy100 = sy10.csy100 and sy12.csy020 = sy02.csy020 order by sy12.csy121 desc
